titleInfo.title: ‘Sketch Plan shewing proposed line of Scarp on the Southern Range, ADEN’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink with wash on tracing clothDimensions:763 x 940 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Relief shown by shading.Line of proposed works shown in red with landmarks lettered for reference to correspond to symbols present on series of sections produced together with the plan. Series of sections hold at IOR/X/3259/1 and IOR/X/3259/2.Includes note on construction and estimated expenses (in Rupees) for proposed works on scarp and bridge at South Pass.Inscriptions:On recto, bottom left-hand corner initials [illegible].
